command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT * FROM complianceSections LIMIT 5

rows.description: Ensuring person-centered care, dignity, respect, and involvement in decision-making
rows.tooltip: This section covers how well you respect service users' choices, preferences, and dignity. Focus on person-centered care practices, communication, and involvement in care planning.

rows.description: Obtaining and documenting valid consent, understanding MCA and DoLS
rows.tooltip: Assess how consent is obtained and recorded. Check understanding of Mental Capacity Act (MCA), Deprivation of Liberty Safeguards (DoLS), and Lasting Power of Attorney (LPA).

rows.description: Comprehensive care planning, holistic support, and meeting individual needs
rows.tooltip: Review care plans for comprehensiveness, person-centeredness, and regular reviews. Ensure all aspects of wellbeing are addressed.

rows.description: Providing adequate nutrition, hydration, and dietary support
rows.tooltip: Check food quality, choice, hydration monitoring, dietary requirements, and nutritional risk assessments.

rows.description: Working effectively with other healthcare and social care providers
rows.tooltip: Assess collaboration with GPs, hospitals, social workers, and other services. Check Memorandums of Understanding (MoU) and information sharing.
